title: Soirée, a night of fabulous music

items.title: Tickets Now Available
items.summary: Many people will be glad to hear this, as I have been asked many times when tickets will be available for the 2023 Soirée. It is a pleasure to announce that tickets are now available for this highly anticipated community live music event! The Soirée…
items.content_html:
Many people will be glad to hear this, as I have been asked many times when tickets will be available for the 2023 Soirée. It is a pleasure to announce that tickets are now available for this highly anticipated community live music event!

The Soirée continues to deliver a diverse range of live music styles and genres. Returning from the 2022 event we have Aliya Grace with some new original songs. New group Amaidí brings traditional Irish tunes with an Australian twist. Rebecca Wright and Donald McKay's music has been likened to that of a good Scotch whisky. The Aristocats bring a modern fusion with slick piano licks, groovy bass lines and tasty drum fills. We will be taken to the imaginary country of Diaspora with folk tunes by Robert Bloodwood. And finally, Monique Clare wields a cello and strikingly crafted vocals.

Our friends at local artisan collective The Gap Creative will be showing artworks by their very talented artists in the art gallery. If you have visited any of their other exhibitions around our community, you will know the very high calibre of our local artists. These artworks will also be available for purchase if you would like to take some home.

Set aside the evening of Saturday 16th September, grab your friends and family, secure some tickets and come along to enjoy some fabulous music, fantastic artwork, wine, food and terrific company.

See you at the Soirée!

items.title: Coming Back in September
items.summary: Save the date for Saturday 16th September when the Soirée is back for another night of fabulous music in The Gap. Another fantastic selection of artists across a range of styles will be guaranteed to please. Tickets go on sale in July.
items.content_html: Save the date for Saturday 16th September when the Soirée is back for another night of fabulous music in The Gap. Another fantastic selection of artists across a range of styles will be guaranteed to please. Tickets go on sale in July.

items.title: Remembering the 2022 Soirée
items.summary: Were you there at the 2022 Soirée to experience a night of fabulous music? Remember some of those wonderful acts or introduce other people to the delights of the Soirée with our photo gallery from the night. The 2023 Soirée is already in the planning…
items.content_html:
Were you there at the 2022 Soirée to experience a night of fabulous music? Remember some of those wonderful acts or introduce other people to the delights of the Soirée with our photo gallery from the night.

The 2023 Soirée is already in the planning stages. Check back here often or like and follow the Facebook page to be notified of announcements.

We'll see you at the next Soirée!

items.title: The Final Group is ... Topology
items.summary: We are very proud to announce that the final group joining the program for the 2022 Soirée are Topology, established leaders in musical creativity in Australia, prolific creators of new original work, expert collaborators across genres and art forms and award-winning music educators. Topology are…
items.content_html:
We are very proud to announce that the final group joining the program for the 2022 Soirée are Topology, established leaders in musical creativity in Australia, prolific creators of new original work, expert collaborators across genres and art forms and award-winning music educators.

Topology are famous for the breadth and depth of their collaborations. Undaunted by stylistic barriers, the quintet has created stunning new work with partners in theatre (Geoffrey Rush, Neil Armfield, Queensland Theatre Company), classical music (the Brodsky Quartet, the Southern Cross Soloists), contemporary art music (Terry Riley, Speak Percussion), dance (Expressions Dance Company, Heidi Duckler Dance Theatre, Jody Oberfelder), puppetry (Dead Puppet Society), contemporary jazz (Trichotomy, Loops), popular songwriting (Kate Miller-Heidke, Katie Noonan), comedy (the Kransky Sisters, Gerry Connolly), Asian music (Dheeraj Shrestha, Ubiet) and indigenous Australian music (William Barton).

Make sure to grab your tickets now to catch Topology, The Vocalise Duo, Aliya Grace, Bluesuits Quartet, Tessitura Acapella and Viridian Quartet at the Soirée on Saturday 4th June.

See you at the Soirée!

items.title: Artists for 2022
items.summary: The tickets are on sale, but we bet you would like to know who is performing. We can answer that now, as we are revealing the artists who will be performing at the 2022 Soirée, making it a night of fabulous music that is not…
items.content_html:
The tickets are on sale, but we bet you would like to know who is performing. We can answer that now, as we are revealing the artists who will be performing at the 2022 Soirée, making it a night of fabulous music that is not to be missed.

Tessitura Acapella will be performing again after a great reception from last year's event. The local acapella group have been audience favourites at the Soirée for a few years now with their complex vocal harmonies injecting new life to well-known tunes.

The Vocalise Duo will also be returning from last year's event, bringing back their exquisite cello and piano sounds to take the audience with them on a journey through the opening movement of Édouard Lalo's Cello Concerto in D minor.

Bluesuits Quartet is a small group jazz ensemble formed in 2021 after playing together in the rhythm section of their high school band. They will be performing compositions by artists such as Miles Davis and the fusion collective Vulfpeck.

Aliya Grace, a former student of The Gap State School who began her journey in music in the instrumental music program, will be performing some original pieces and covers on guitar.

Viridian Quartet, formed in 2021 by a group of dedicated string players from the University of Queensland with significant solo, chamber and orchestral experience, will be joined by an outstanding pianist to perform Dvorak's Piano Quintet Op. 81.

There is one more group that will be announced very soon that will complete the program.

Grab your tickets now to hear these great performances at the Soirée on Saturday 4th June at The Gap State School MPB. Doors open at 5:30pm, enjoy a drink and some food, and browse the art gallery before the show starts at 6:30pm.

See you at the Soirée!

items.title: 2022 Tickets Now Available
items.summary: Tickets are now available for the 2022 Soirée, which is guaranteed to be another night of fabulous music! Head over to the Tickets page to secure your seats at the new lower price of $20. Also remember to like and follow the Facebook page to…
items.content_html:
Tickets are now available for the 2022 Soirée, which is guaranteed to be another night of fabulous music! Head over to the Tickets page to secure your seats at the new lower price of $20. Also remember to like and follow the Facebook page to see artist announcements as they are released.

With a couple of groups returning from the successful 2021 Soirée along with a bunch of new musicians, the night will have something for everyone with a fresh variety of musical styles. Artist announcements will happen over the coming weeks. Also returning is the art gallery, the beer and wine, the food, and of course the fantastic atmosphere.

So come along, bring your family, friends and neighbours, and join other members of the community to enjoy a night of fabulous music and great company. Help to support local musicians and also the instrumental and choral programs at The Gap State School.

Grab your tickets, and we'll see you at the Soirée!

items.title: Flashback to 2021
items.summary: Preparations for the 2022 Soirée on Saturday 4th June are now underway. We almost have a full program of musicians ready to perform, and it is going to be another fabulous show. In the lead up to the next Soirée, we have posted a gallery…
items.content_html:
Preparations for the 2022 Soirée on Saturday 4th June are now underway. We almost have a full program of musicians ready to perform, and it is going to be another fabulous show.

In the lead up to the next Soirée, we have posted a gallery of photos from the last event. Many great memories from a fantastic night if you were there, and if you weren't it is a good preview of what you will see when you come to the next one. Who was your favourite act?

Enjoy the gallery of the last Soirée, and we will see you at the next Soirée!

items.title: The Next Soirée?
items.summary: After a bit of downtime to recover from the Soirée of 2021, we are now back with planning for the 2022 event. When will that be, we hear you ask. We have booked in Saturday 4th June, 2022 for the next Soirée. That time in…
items.content_html:
After a bit of downtime to recover from the Soirée of 2021, we are now back with planning for the 2022 event. When will that be, we hear you ask.

We have booked in Saturday 4th June, 2022 for the next Soirée. That time in the third quarter of the year was quite busy for many people, and looking ahead it appears it will be similar again. So we made the decision to move it a bit earlier in the year. It will be bigger and better, with another collection of local musicians and groups to entertain. There will be beer and wine. There will be more glorious food. There will be another beautiful art gallery. And of course there will be you, our wonderful patrons to enjoy the night. There will be more announcements in early 2022, so keep in touch for all the updates.

If you have a business and would be interested in sponsoring the Soirée in 2022, please contact us. There are many costs to run an event such as this, and sponsorship helps us to provide the tickets at a reasonable price.

See you at the next Soirée!

items.title: That is a Wrap!
items.summary: And that is a wrap for another night of fabulous music at the Soirée. It was a long day, setting up, the event, then cleaning up, my body was aching and sore, but it was a fantastic night and I loved every minute of…
items.content_html:
And that is a wrap for another night of fabulous music at the Soirée. It was a long day, setting up, the event, then cleaning up, my body was aching and sore, but it was a fantastic night and I loved every minute of it.
 
Thank you to all of the volunteers who helped with the night. You made this night run smoothly and it was a pleasure to watch everything happen.
 
Thank you to the sponsors. Concept Carpentry and Ray White The Gap. Cr Steven Toomey and the Lord Mayor's Community Fund. Jonty Bush - Member for Cooper and all of the businesses that donated prizes for the raffles.
 
Thank you to all of the performers who played for us. It was indeed some fabulous music, and we loved listening to it. Thank you for sharing it with us, including the senior instrumental students from The Gap State School and the String Quartet from The Gap State High School, the school that also provided the wonderful visual art displays.
 
And thank you to everyone who attended the night. It is you that make this night possible. Seeing everyone enjoying a great night out is what drives us to do this.
See you at the next Soirée!

items.title: Thank You To Our Sponsors
items.summary: Without the gracious support of our sponsors, whether it be financial to help cover the cost of putting on an event or through donations, the Soirée would not be possible. Please consider supporting these local businesses and individuals that help us to provide live music…
items.content_html:
Without the gracious support of our sponsors, whether it be financial to help cover the cost of putting on an event or through donations, the Soirée would not be possible. Please consider supporting these local businesses and individuals that help us to provide live music events in our community.

Jonty Bush MP
